channel.title: CVE Feed for istyle Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-45203|2024-09-09T06:42:30.971Z -- istyle%20inc. -- %22%40cosme%22%20app%20for%20android
item.description: Improper authorization in handler for custom URL scheme issue in "@cosme" App for Android versions prior 5.69.0 and "@cosme" App for iOS versions prior to 6.74.0 allows an attacker to lead a user to access an arbitrary website via the vulnerable App. As a result, the user may become a victim of a phishing attack.
